thread.title: Social media reacts to ESPN's Top 25: 'The KD disrespect is crazy'
thread.title_full: Social media reacts to ESPN's Top 25: 'The KD disrespect is crazy'

author: Sam Yip
title: Social media reacts to ESPN's Top 25: 'The KD disrespect is crazy'
text:
ESPN dropped a Top 25 list for the 21st century, and not surprisingly, people on social media had much to say about it. Some thought Kevin Durant was too low, while others thought Steve Nash was too high.
Check out some of the other instant reactions to the rankings.
The KD disrespect crazy

[July 25, 2024]
This espn top 25 NBA players of the 21st century is legit top shelf banter.
